title: Little Red Book Data Retrieval

alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve data such as title, like count, etc., based on Little Red Book article links
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. For mapping, ensure the field names in the multi-dimensional table match the option names. 'Blogger' field type suggested as text, 'xx count' as number, and 'xx time' as date. 'Total Interaction Count' field can be calculated from multiple fields

checks.2: Type Check Failed: Type is not a number
checks.1: Type Check Failed: Type is not text
checks.5: Type Check Failed: Type is not a date
checks.17: Type Check Failed: Type is not an attachment

placeholder.link: Please select the field column corresponding to the video link
placeholder.interCount: Please select all the field columns that need to be calculated
placeholder.cookie: Please enter the cookie as per the help guide
placeholder.xSCommon: Please enter X-S-Common as per the help guide
